TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSetter extends System.Windows.SetterBase

summary.span: 表示樣式中的事件 Setter。

span.span: Represents an event setter in a style.

summary.span: 事件 Setter 會叫用指定的事件處理常式以回應事件。

span.span: Event setters invoke the specified event handlers in response to events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件 setter 會叫用指定的事件處理常式，以回應路由事件，其會套用至參考的所有項目不需要您將執行個體處理常式附加至每個個別的項目。Event setters invoke the specified event handlers in response to routed events, which apply to all elements that reference the rather than requiring you to attach instance handlers to each individual element. 只有支援物件。Only support objects. 您只可以宣告事件的路由的事件的事件 setter。You can only declare event setters for events that are routed events. 事件反昇事件，或通道事件，您可以宣告具有直接的路由策略，路由事件的事件 setter。You can declare event setters for routed events with a direct routing strategy, bubbling events, or tunneling events. 執行個體類別通常會建立透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]物件內的項目樣式定義透過[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Instances of the class are usually created through [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an object element within a style defined through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 可能也會從具現化程式碼。An might also be instantiated from code. 事件 setter 不能在佈景主題資源字典中包含的樣式。Event setters cannot be used in a style that is contained in a theme resource dictionary. 這是因為在執行階段的佈景主題資源字典通常是鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)]檔案，而且沒有任何範圍定義隨附的程式碼後置定義處理常式可以存在的位置。This is because a theme resource dictionary at run time is often loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] files, and does not have any scope defined where accompanying code-behind that defines the handlers can exist. 任何事件的類別處理常式之後以及在任何執行個體處理常式之後，會叫用事件 setter 透過附加處理常式。Handlers attached through event setters are invoked after any class handlers for an event, and also after any instance handlers. 如此一來，如果類別處理常式或執行個體處理常式將標記在其引數中處理事件，然後宣告的事件 setter 處理常式不叫用時，除非特別將事件 setter `true`。As a result, if a class handler or instance handler marks an event handled in its arguments, then the handler declared by an event setter is not invoked, unless the event setter specifically sets `true`. 事件 setter 也可能來自於樣式。Event setters may also come from styles. 從樣式指定為事件 setter 處理常式之後立即樣式上的處理常式將會叫用。The event setter handlers from the style specified as will be invoked after the handlers on the immediate style. 請注意，只有支援物件。Note that only supports objects. 觸發程序 (和衍生類別) 不支援。Triggers ( and derived classes) do not support . ## Examples 下列範例會建立單一頁面層級樣式內。The following example establishes a single within a page-level style. [!code-xaml[EventOvwSupport#XAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml#xaml2)] 下面顯示的範例事件處理常式：The following shows the example event handlers: [!code-csharp[EventOvwSupport#EventSetterRef](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml.cs#eventsetterref)] [!code-vb[EventOvwSupport#EventSetterRef](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/visualbasic/page2.xaml.vb#eventsetterref)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此簽章通常會使用您建立程式碼或程式碼後置來建立，增強了現有的樣式之前使用。This signature is typically used if you creating an in code, or in code-behind to create an that augments an existing style prior to use.

value.span: 路由事件的識別項欄位。

span.span: The identifier field of the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法設定這個屬性一次樣式包含正在使用中，因此密封格式。You cannot set this property once the style containing the is in use and thus is sealed. 如果您在程式碼中設定此屬性很可能正在使用的樣式，請檢查的值上的屬性執行個體，然後再嘗試設定。If you set this property in code and there is the possibility that the style is in use, check the value of the property on the instance before you attempt to set . ## Examples 下列範例會設定一部分的屬性標記樣式。The following example sets the property as part of an in a markup style. [!code-xaml[EventOvwSupport#XAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml#xaml2)]

exception.span: 嘗試在密封的 上設定這個屬性。

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值決定是否仍應叫用指派給 setter 的處理常式，即使事件已在其事件資料中標記為已處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the handler assigned to the setter should still be invoked, even if the event is marked handled in its event data.

value.span: 如果仍應叫用處理常式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the handler should still be invoked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定特性會叫用事件處理常式的方式必須一律執行中程式碼中，為了保持通則是沒辦法指定指派時定義事件處理常式的執行個體直接到名為中的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]屬性語法。Setting the characteristics of how an event's handlers will be invoked must always be performed in code, in keeping with the general principle that there is no way to specify when assigning defined event handlers for instances directly to named events in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute syntax. 將此值設定雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]不會產生任何編譯時期錯誤，所產生的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]時使用的樣式，將會產生執行階段例外狀況。Although setting this value in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] does not generate any compile-time errors, the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will produce a run-time exception when the style is used. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個屬性不應在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This property should not be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks.
